alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 12:18AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Benton, Madison, central Carroll and eastern Washington Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1217 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of War Eagle to near Wesley to near Winslow. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Green Forest... St. Paul... Hindsville... Wesley... Rudd... Saint Paul... Kingston... Forum... Aurora... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Japton... Witter... Marble... Osage... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for northwestern Arkansas.
